name: Day In Life Of Probation Period
name_original: Day In Life Of Probation Period
description:
- An entry for Bored Pixels Jam 8 which I.. barely.. finished.

You're in the probation period of your new job at the Intelligence Agency of MEH city for 3 days. Your role is to find and report wanted people to keep the city safe.

The wanted list contains only those who would commit a crime soon and should be reported within a day.

Succeed in the probation period and get fully hired!
